title: Gazing at the Sky
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Kanata-san, Kanata-san, could you recommend a napping spot for me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah, but, Setsuna-chan, you’re headed for a nap? That’s unheard of.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ehehe...... I wanted to try something that Kanata-san loves to do.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Really~? Kanata-chan is happy to hear that for some reason.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I like how you always look comfortable wherever you sleep. It seems really pleasant...... I’m not very good at staying still, so I want to try it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Right now, Kanata-chan recommends the roof. There’s a nice breeze up there, and you get a great view of the autumn sky and the nature and become all sleepy...... Yawn~ Just thinking about it makes me sleepy......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ah! Kanata-san, don’t fall asleep yet! Let’s go to the roof!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Right. Kanata-chan needs to show Setsuna-chan the appeal of napping~  Come on, Setsuna-chan, let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ah, my pillow, my pillow~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
